Indian Economy.title: LinkedIn CEO warns college degrees are losing relevance, calls ‘human skills’ the real secret weapon in AI era

Indian Economy.title: UPI has closed a chink in its security armour: Its payment request feature is finally gone
Indian Economy.summary: For years, scamsters exploited a UPI feature that was designed for convenience but enabled them to prey on unsuspecting users who could be tricked into sending them money. On 1 October, NPCI killed that option. This is good news for India’s booming cashless e…
